general.q: What is the BuffBets affiliate program?
general.a: It's a program that allows you to earn by attracting new players to our platform.

general.q: How does the BuffBets affiliate program work?
general.a: You place affiliate links, users register, and you receive a percentage of the profit.

general.q: How do I become a BuffBets affiliate partner?
general.a: Register on our website, fill out your profile, and contact a manager to activate your account.

general.q: Is participation in the affiliate program free?
general.a: Yes, participation is completely free. We don't charge any fees for joining.

general.q: Which GEOs can I attract traffic from?
general.a: We work with a wide list of GEOs. Check with your personal manager for the current list.

general.q: What is an affiliate link and how do I get one?
general.a: It's a unique link that assigns a player to you. It's available in your dashboard after registration.

general.q: Can I promote BuffBets on multiple platforms?
general.a: Yes, you can create separate streams for each platform to track effectiveness.

income.a: Payouts are made weekly or monthly, depending on your plan terms.

income.q: What is the minimum withdrawal amount?
income.a: The minimum withdrawal amount is 50 USDT.
We work with CPA, RevShare, and Hybrid models. Discuss terms with your manager.

modal.title: BECOME A PARTNER
modal.desc: Fill out the form and our manager will contact you shortly.
modal.success_desc: Thank you! We've already started processing it.
